issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Tests are executed with Postgres as metastore. These 2 test
testCliDriver_escape1 and 
testCliDriver_escape2 fails throwing NPE.
fields.summary: NPE exception in Tests escape1 and escape2.

comments.body:
Exception trace is as follows

{noformat}
